snippet: Judge Thomas N. Durkin of Federal District Court on Tuesday delayed J. Dennis Hastert’s first court appearance after his indictment in a hush-money case
abstract: Federal Judge Thomas N Durkin delays, without explanation, first court appearance of former House Speaker J Dennis Hastert in wake of his indictment in hush-money case.
lead_paragraph: Judge Thomas N. Durkin of Federal District Court on Tuesday delayed J. Dennis Hastert’s first court appearance after his indictment in a hush-money case
